description: (Product k^k) * (Sum 1/k^k) where both the sum and product are over those positive integers k that divide n.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
maple: with(numtheory):a:= n-> (l-> mul(k^k, k=l)*add(1/k^k, k=l))(divisors(n)):seq(a(n), n=1..20);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 22 2015
author: _Leroy Quet_, Oct 11 2000
